entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Tadoussac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
